name: The Video Game History Foundation Supporter Pack
name_original: The Video Game History Foundation Supporter Pack
description:
The Video Game History Foundation Supporter Pack is a special bundle that is meant to help promote classic games by sharing some awesome digital goodies including concept art, promotional assets, artbooks, music, etc. All proceeds from the Pack go to game preservation initiatives.

The pack includes goodies from:
  • The Elder Scrolls: Concept arts, hi-resolution graphic assets and fact sheet from Oblivion and Morrowind;
  • Yakuza: Character’s art assets, logo and screenshots;
  • Crusader Kings II: Screenshots, trailer and interview with the developer;
  • Ascension to the Throne: Concept arts, wallpapers, logos and screenshots;

and many, many more.

The Video Game History Foundation is a non-profit organization dedicated to preserving, celebrating, and teaching the history of video games. Learn more about their mission and initiatives in our interview.
